channel.title: TaiwanPlus - Latest News
channel.description: Your source of news, culture, and infotainment from Taiwan, a voice of freedom in Asia.

item.title: Southeastern Taiwan County Gets First PET Scanner
item.description: Taiwan's southeastern county of Taitung just got its first PET scanner, a piece of medical equipment that helps detect cancer at early stages.

item.title: Rescued Formosan Black Bear Returns to the Wild
item.description: A one-year-old Formosan black bear has been released back into the wild after months of treatment for an injury it sustained from a snare trap.

item.title: Opposition Lawmakers Visit Taiwan-Governed Taiping Island in South China Sea
item.description: A group of opposition lawmakers has returned to Taiwan’s main island after visiting Taiping Island, also known as Itu Aba, a hotly contested landmass in the South China Sea governe

item.title: Opposition Rally Sends Warning to President-Elect Lai Before Inauguration
